pages.title: Netherite Hoe
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Hoe is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/diamond_hoe)Diamond Hoe$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has a greater durability than the last one and it can't be burned in fire or lava.

pages.name: Netherite Hoe
pages.text: You can right click in a Grass or Dirt block while you are holding it in your hand to create Farmland.
